item.description:
Hi everyone, get ready for a SUNDAY meetup at FENWAY BARK!

Fenway Bark is a "pawsome" pet hotel, day care, boutique, groomer, etc, etc, etc. They're air conditioned, they've got plenty of free parking, and they even provide us with our own private room to play in!! The staff is super nice and the views of Boston Harbor are great - you can even watch the planes landing at Logan! So come play from 10am - 12pm.

We even get 20% off all services and products during that time!! So stock up on your dog food, treats, toys and even stylish collars & leashes.

From Fenway Bark: For the safety of all our guests, we require that all dogs who use our indoor lawns have all our  health requirements met - documentation showing up to date vaccinations and a negative fecal float in the past 6 months. Dogs attending must have up-to-date rabies vaccinations. Veterinary records can be faxed to Fenway Bark at 617-507-8271 in advance of the meetup. Intact dogs need to be kept on a non retractable leash for the safety of all guests.

Since this meetup takes place indoors, in an area that cannot divide the frenchies from larger dogs, we respectfully ask that only frenchies attend the Fenway Bark meetups. Feel free to bring your frenchie's canine siblings to the other outdoor meetups in public spaces like Peters Park!

Mandatory dues are $7 per frenchie for each Fenway Bark meetup, cash only.
$50 goes to Fenway Bark's hosting fee, $12 goes to meetup.com's monthly fee, and anything received in excess of $62 will be donated to the French Bulldog Rescue Network in the group's name. :)

Thanks so much, we can't wait to see you! Letitia & Clyde

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: April French Bulldog Meetup
